ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Cold Restarts: The Joes go back to the abandoned Russian hut where they first encountered Kwinn the Eskimo trying to steal plans for a low-frequency radio wave beamer aimed at the U.S. to entice violence, and encounter Cobra agents already there as part of the Commander's new plan, who capture them. Destro's been cut off by the Commander as his arms dealer and replaced by the surviving Darklon, previously thought dead. Blizzard goes off to rescue his captured buddies. Firefly hires Crystal Ball to help him infiltrate Joe's laser tower.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 14:56:31. [CVDB273186] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 10:19:16. [Issue ID 846849]
